title: E-commerce-Management
description: Multi-Role System: Create a multi-role system with roles such as customer, shop manager, and system admin, each with specific access and permissions.React for building dynamic user interfaces.Tailwind CSS for modern and responsive styling. Stripe js for payment. MongoDb, express & node for server

title: Softnee-Electronic-Brandshop
description: React for building dynamic user interfaces.Tailwind CSS for modern and responsive styling MongoDB for streamlined data storage.Express and Node.js for a robust, scalable server.Firebase for secure user authentication User can add a product & customer can cart them. use category based data & display them
